title: US blocks all offshore wind construction, says reason is classified
author: rbanffy
aiHeadline: US government blocks offshore wind construction, citing 'classified reasons'—because clearly, nothing says 'green energy' like top-secret bureaucratic red tape.

title: If you don't design your career, someone else will (2014)
author: TheAlchemist
aiHeadline: If you don't design your career, someone else will—probably while you're still in your pajamas at 10 AM on a Tuesday.

title: Flock Exposed Its AI-Powered Cameras to the Internet. We Tracked Ourselves
author: chaps
aiHeadline: Flock's AI-powered cameras exposed to the internet: because nothing says 'privacy' like letting the world track your every move.

title: Claude Code gets native LSP support
author: JamesSwift
aiHeadline: Claude Code finally gets native LSP support—because even AI needs a little help with its code sometimes.

title: Jimmy Lai Is a Martyr for Freedom
author: mooreds
aiHeadline: Jimmy Lai is a martyr for freedom, according to some folks who probably don't live under a rock—or in a country with actual censorship.
